ActorTalk: Target detected. Activating portrait capture mode—Movement stopped. Auto-adjusting framing parameters—
That sound... the camera followed us here.
The screen is all blurry... Has it not finished adjusting?
Let me adjust position. Maybe that'll help.
The red light on top just started blinking.
Let me check. The number on the side shows how many shots we've got left. Looks like...
Hurry, Commandant. This might be the last shot.
It'd be a real shame if you weren't in the last picture.
Fireworks, check. People, check. And these sparklers we're holding can't be left out.
Alright. Put them in the center. That looks perfect.
Just a few seconds left. Three, two, one...
Let me move a bit closer.
